sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_786b5c1413f55740d26f5e7f3244b052
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.QueueManagerGroups</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>QueueManagerGroups</name><script><![CDATA[var QueueManagerGroups = Class.create();
QueueManagerGroups.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	//return array of ids for groups what have queue manager enabled
	QueueManagerGroups: function(){
		var ids  = [];
		var gr = new GlideRecord ('sys_user_group');
		gr.query();

		while (gr.next()) {
			if (gr.u_enable){
				ids.push(gr.sys_id.getDisplayValue().toString());
			}
		}

		return ids;
	},

    type: 'QueueManagerGroups'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin-nexisn4</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-04-26 18:58:12</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>786b5c1413f55740d26f5e7f3244b052</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>QueueManagerGroups</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_786b5c1413f55740d26f5e7f3244b052</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin-nexisn4</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-04-26 20:33:17</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

var am_pm = sysevent.processed.getDisplayValue().split(" ")[2].toString(); if (am_pm == "PM"){ inc_time = Number(inc_time) + 120000; } return inc_time.toString(); } //user didn't pick up an incident. else{ return "000000"; //decision to set the user value of key-value to 000000 stuff above if user didnt pick up an incident today. //gonna use this 0000 to sort later } } //go through all sysevent where incident is assigned to this user today. //check if the record matches this guy's id. //if match, return the time. //if no match, return "000000" function getLastIncTimeMultipleUsers(name, id){ record sysevent.orderByDesc("processed"); sysevent.query(); //see if there are records. //if there are 0 records, that means no user with this name picked up an incident today. //return 000000 if (sysevent.getRowCount() == 0){ return "000000"; } //there is 1+ records for this user picking up an incident today. while (sysevent.next()){ //get the inc for this event var inc = new GlideRecord("incident"); inc.addQuery("sys_id", sysevent.instance); inc.query(); //for this inc, if (inc.next()){ //check if this inc is assigned to this user if (inc.assigned_to == id){ //return the time entry for the new key-value entry if user picked up an incident today //this is the most recent incident the user picked up // right now, the format is {<user sys_id> : <2018-04-10 10:04:17>} // change it to {<user sys_id> : 100417} var inc_time = sysevent.processed.getDisplayValue().split(" ")[1].replace(/:/g, "").toString(); //inc_time = "104117" //parseInt doesnt return the correct number. //using Number(x) instead. // also add 120000 if PM var am_pm = sysevent.processed.getDisplayValue().split(" ")[2].toString(); if (am_pm == "PM"){ inc_time = Number(inc_time) + 120000; } return inc_time.toString(); } //if assigned } //if inc } //while sysevent //went through all sysevent that has this user's name, but there was no match. then return 000000. return "000000"; } //the format from sysevent query is: {9fa... : 2018-04-10 22:04:17} etc //but i will change the value to 100311 (24hour:60min:60sec) for easy parsing. //so dict format will be {f9a... : "100311", dict var str = ""; for (var key in users_and_times) { str += "key: " + key + "\t" + "value: " + users_and_times[key] + "\n"; } gs.info("QM: the users_and_times dict is: \n" + str); //get min time value - meaning this person has the oldest time for inc pickup var min_user; var min_value = 999999; for (var id in users_and_times) { // console.log("key: " + key + "\t" + "value: " + a user_name is unique within current incident's AG function isUnique(name){ var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_user_grmember"); gr.addQuery("group", current.assignment_group); gr.addQuery("user.name", "STARTSWITH", name); gr.query(); if (gr.getRowCount() == 1) return true; return false; } //return the last time this user in the AG picked up an incident today //"000000" if not found. function getLastIncTime(name){ //look at sysevent table var sysevent = new GlideRecord("sysevent"); //for when this user last picked up an incident today var query_str = "sys_created_onONToday@javascript:gs.beginningOfToday()@javascript:gs.endOfToday()^name=incident.assigned^parm1=" + name; sysevent.addEncodedQuery(query_str); //query by Desc to get the most recent record sysevent.orderByDesc("processed"); sysevent.query(); //if user picked up an incident today if (sysevent.next()){ //return the time entry for the new key-value entry if user picked up an incident today //this is the most recent incident the user picked up // right now, the format is {<user sys_id> : <2018-04-10 10:04:17>} // change it to {<user sys_id> : 100417} var inc_time = sysevent.processed.getDisplayValue().split(" ")[1].replace(/:/g, "").toString(); //inc_time = "104117" //parseInt doesnt return the correct number. //using Number(x) instead. // also add 120000 if PM var am_pm = sysevent.processed.getDisplayValue().split(" ")[2].toString(); if (am_pm == "PM"){ inc_time = Number(inc_time) + 120000; } return inc_time.toString(); } //user didn't pick up an incident. else{ return "000000"; //decision to set the user value of key-value to 000000 stuff above if user didnt pick up an incident today. //gonna use this 0000 to sort later } } //go through all sysevent where incident is assigned to this user today. //check if the record matches this guy's id. //if match, return the time. //if no match, return "000000" function getLastIncTimeMultipleUsers(name, id){ //look at sysevent table var sysevent = new GlideRecord("sysevent"); //for when this user last picked up an incident today var query_str = "sys_created_onONToday@javascript:gs.beginningOfToday()@javascript:gs.endOfToday()^name=incident.assigned^parm1=" + name; sysevent.addEncodedQuery(query_str); //query by Desc to get the most recent record sysevent.orderByDesc("processed"); sysevent.query(); //see if there are records. //if there are 0 records, that means no user with this name picked up an incident today. //return 000000 if (sysevent.getRowCount() == 0){ return "000000"; } //there is 1+ records for this user picking up an incident today. while (sysevent.next()){ //get the inc for this event var inc = new GlideRecord("incident"); inc.addQuery("sys_id", sysevent.instance); inc.query(); //for this inc, if (inc.next()){ //check if this inc is assigned to this user if (inc.assigned_to == id){ //return the time entry for the new key-value entry if user picked up an incident today //this is the most recent incident the user picked up // right now, the format is {<user sys_id> : <2018-04-10 10:04:17>} // change it to {<user sys_id> : 100417} var inc_time = sysevent.processed.getDisplayValue().split(" ")[1].replace(/:/g, "").toString(); //inc_time = "104117" //parseInt doesnt return the correct number. //using Number(x) instead. // also add 120000 if PM var am_pm = sysevent.processed.getDisplayValue().split(" ")[2].toString(); if (am_pm == "PM"){ inc_time = Number(inc_time) + 120000; } return inc_time.toString(); } //if assigned } //if inc } //while sysevent //went through all sysevent that has this user's name, but there was no match. then return 000000. return "000000"; }
